go_data.justification: ORC3 is part of the origin recognition complex (ORC) that binds to DNA replication origins.
Chromatin-bound ORC3 and ORC5 are multi-mono-ubiquitylated in a cell cycle regulated manner.
OBI1 catalyses the multi-mono-ubiquitylation of a subset of chromatin-bound ORC3 and ORC5 during S-phase.
ORC3 is involved in DNA replication and is expected to be located in the nucleus.
